title: Physics: Projectile Motion Quiz
description: This is a short multiple-choice quiz to test your understanding of projectile motion concepts, including range, height, and time of flight.
subject: Physics

title: Math: Algebra Review
description: Complete the attached worksheet on solving linear and quadratic equations. This will help prepare you for the upcoming exam.
subject: Math

title: History: Research Topic Brainstorm
description: Brainstorm five potential topics for your upcoming research paper on World War II. Write a brief 2-3 sentence summary for each.
subject: History

title: CS: Python Function Practice
description: Write three simple Python functions: one to find the factorial of a number, one to check for a palindrome, and one to reverse a string.
subject: Computer Science
